dimensions:
Warp x Weft (a): 28.5 x 30.5 cm (11 1/4 x 12 in.)
Warp x Weft (b): 47.5 x 14 cm (18 11/16 x 5 1/2 in.)
Repeat H (b only): 31.8 cm (12 1/2 in.)
title: Chintz fragments
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for 3 reds, 2 purples and black applied by pen and brush.  Madder dyed. Blue applied by immersion over resist. Yellow applied by brush (chintz).
description: Floral stripe at left; chevron stripe in the middle; floral medallions at right. A painted adaption of a European block printed cotton.
name: Chintz fragments
